summary: Add a realm type arena and seven custom demon based of seven sin.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][b][size=5]SEVEN SIN HELL ARENA[/size][/b]

Add a realm type arena and seven custom demon based on the seven sin.
>> and yes all the NPC are Respawn and Levels <<

[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]Gameplay:

Don't attack them while they are still in the trone and wait.

First you must enter the realm of hell or oblivion in this case,
after that simply walkup to whoever in the circle wall then begin the fight.
If you win simply wait until tomorrow to begin the next fight and so on.
if you attack them while they are sitting, they will simply ignore your attack.
And there is a change that even after you wait until the next day and you already attack them
they won't come down and simply charge ther spell if that happen
either your leave and comeback later or load your game wicthever faster.
So the bottomline is do not attack them while they are sitting in the throne.[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]

[size=3][b][size=3][size=3][size=3][b]>>New Location<<
[/b][/size][/size][/size][/b][size=3][size=3][size=3]Near Whiterun Westren watchtower and
Look for the Gate door[/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/font] like in the image 4

[b]>> Warning <<[/b]
All the demon or Dremora of this mod has been added with extra 1000 health and magicka.
"Well because they are dremora"

Name: Sloth
Class: Spellsword
Weapon: Sloth Dagger
Levels: 50 - 150

Name: Envy
Class: Assassin
Weapon: Envy Daggers
Levels: 50 - 150

Name: Gluttony
Class: Spellsword
Weapon: Gluttony Mase
Levels: [font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]50[/size][/font] - 150

Name: Wrath
Class: Warior 2H
Weapon: Wrath Battleaxe
Levels: [font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]50[/size][/font] - 150

Name: Pride
Class: Warior 2H
Weapon: Pride Greatsword
Levels: [font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]50[/size][/font] - 150

Name: Lust
Class: Spellsword
Weapon: Lust Sword
Levels: [font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]50[/size][/font] - 150

Name: Greed
Class: Spellsword
Weapon: Greed Waraxe
Levels: [font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]50[/size][/font] - 150[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][size=3][b]

Skyrim.esm
